text:
TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
STATEMENT OF OBJECTS AND REASONS
The Hon'ble Chief Minister during budget session for the year 2011 2012 has announced on 13-09-2011 on the floor of the Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly that a new "Fisheries University" will be established at Nagapattinam Taluk.
2. To give effect to the said announcement, it has been decided to establish a "Fisheries University" at Nagapattinam Taluk.
3. The Bill seeks to give effect to above decision.
K.A. JAYAPAL,
Minister for Fisheries.
133
